entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
